txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Soft skin from the beasts surrounding Oatbarton. You can make the delivery to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton centre.
'We can find a use for these. Thank you.'
'We can make use of nearly everything that comes off the beasts near us. If you find anything that you think might be useful bring it to me.'
The townsfolk in Oatbarton await the delivery of soft skin to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town.
Deliver the soft skin to Ponto Oats at Oatbarton
You have been tasked with collecting and delivering soft skin from the beasts surrounding Oatbarton. You are to deliver the items to Ponto Oats at the centre of the town of Oatbarton.
Wanted: Soft skin from the beasts surrounding Oatbarton.
